name: Scotch Permanent Glue Sticks, Acid-Free Non-Toxic Adhesive (2-Pack) – Strong & Fast Bond, No-Mess Application for Paper, Photos, Crafts
short_description: Strong Permanent Bond: Reliable glue stick adhesive that creates a lasting bond on paper, cardboard, photos, and fabric. Ideal for school crafts, scrapbooking, and office tasks requiring a secure, wrinkle-free hold.
No-Mess Application: Glue applies smoothly with a twist-up stick – no drips, leaks, or sticky fingers. It dries clear for a clean, mess-free finish, making crafting and pasting neat and easy.

Child-Safe & Non-Toxic: Formulated to be acid-free and non-toxic, safe for use by children and for archival projects. It conforms to ASTM D-4236 standards, so it won’t degrade or yellow photos and papers over time.
Washable Formula: Cleans off hands and household surfaces with soap and water. Also washes out of many fabrics, so accidental smudges are easy to remove during creative projects.

Value 2-Pack: Includes two glue sticks for double the usage. Each stick is a convenient size to fit in pencil boxes and supply drawers. Keep one at home and one at school, or one in the office and one in your craft kit.

name: Gorilla Hot Glue Sticks, Clear Glue, Mini Size 4" Long x 0.27" Diameter, 75 Count (Pack of 1) - Safe for All Temperatures with Extended Working Time
short_description: Impact tough: Gorilla hot glue gun sticks create an incredibly durable bond for projects that last
All temperature: Safe for both high & low temperature hot glue guns; Use with high temp guns for strong bonding on wood, plastic, metal, glass and more
Low temp: Use with a low temp hot glue gun for delicate surface materials like floral, fabric, foam, jewelry and more
Extended working time: Gorilla Glue sticks have an extended working time of 45 seconds for added convenience
Weather resistant: Our hot glue stick formula is for indoor and outdoor use, while not recommended for continual water exposure
product_description: Incredibly tough & versatile, Gorilla Hot Glue Sticks provide a long term hold even on hard to bond surfaces. The clear adhesive works with both high and low temperature glue guns and features an extended working time for added convenience for all types of projects. Gorilla Hot Glue is also weather-resistant and incredibly durable, keeping your projects safe from seasonal temperature swings that can cause other glues to fail. Directions: 1. Use either low or high temp glue gun, per glue gun instructions. High temp: use with high temp guns for strong bonding: wood, plastic, metal, glass, and more! low temp: use with low temp guns for delicate surface materials: floral, fabric, foam, jewelry, and more! 2. Test product before its intended use. Working time is dependent on amount of glue applied and temperature of glue gun. Full size sticks are 0. 44 in. Diameter and mini size sticks are 0. 27 in. Diameter. Mini size sticks should be used in mini size glue guns capable of dispensing 0. 27 in diameter sticks. Full size sticks should be used in full size glue guns capable of dispensing 0. 43 in diameter sticks. Click on the Gorilla link at the top of this page to see other quality products from the Gorilla glue company.

White glue bonds to paper, photos, cardboard, foam board, fabric, glass and more. These craft glue sticks are also great during the holidays. name: Surebonder All-Temperature, All-Purpose 5 lb Box of 10-Inch Full-Size Hot Glue Sticks for Crafts/DIY - About 94 Glue Sticks Per Box, Clear
short_description: ALL-PURPOSE HOT GLUE STICKS - These glue sticks are designed for all-purpose use, making them suitable for various materials such as wood, cardboard, foam, fabric, paper, ribbons, plastics, and metals.

ALL TEMPERATURE CAPABILITY - These all-purpose hot glue sticks can be used in any full-size low-temperature, high-temperature, and dual-temperature hot glue guns ensuring maximum compatibility. For best results, pair with any Surebonder full-size hot glue gun.
QUANTITY AND SIZE - Each 5 lb bulk box contains approximately 94 hot glue sticks, each measuring 10 inches long, and 7/16" in diameter. This provides ample supply for your crafting and DIY needs.

HIGH STRENGTH BONDING - Our hot glue sticks create a strong bond that ensures your projects stay put. Made from durable, high-quality materials, our hot glue sticks ensure reliable performance and superior results compared to competitors' products.
MADE IN THE USA WITH GLOBALLY SOURCED MATERIALS - All Surebonder hot glue sticks are proudly engineered and manufactured with globally sourced materials in Wauconda, IL.
product_description: Product Description Surebonder Full Size All Temperature Glue Sticks are clear all-purpose hot melt adhesives to be applied in either low, high, or dual temperature glue guns. This glue is great for craft projects and product assembly projects. A must for the DIY homeowner. Bonds to porous and non-porous materials. Each glue stick is 10-Inch in length and 7/16-inch in diameter. Approximately 94 pieces per box. From the Manufacturer Surebonder 725R510 10-Inch General Purpose All Temperature Glue Sticks work at either low temperature (230 degrees F) or High temperature (380 degrees F). Bonds to porous and non porous substrates. Compositional compliance with FDA regulation #21CFG175.105 for food packaging. Clear color with 60 second open time
